org.apache.ctakes.core.nlp.tokenizer

Class Tokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ctakes.core.nlp.tokenizer.Tokenizer

  • public class Tokenizer
extends Object
    A class used to break natural text into tokens. The token markup is external to the text and is not embedded like XML. Character offset location is used to identify the boundaries of a token.
    Author:
    Mayo Clinic

      • tokenizeAndSort

        public List<Token> tokenizeAndSort(String text)
                            throws Exception
        Tokenizes a string of text and outputs a list of Token objects in sorted order.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to tokenize.
        Returns:
        A list of Token objects sorted by the order they appear in the text.
        Throws:
        Exception - Thrown if an error occurs while tokenizing.

      • tokenize

        public List<Token> tokenize(String text)
                     throws Exception
        Tokenizes a string of text and outputs a list of Token objects. The list is not guaranteed to be sorted.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to tokenize.
        Returns:
        A list of Token objects.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • isAlphabetLetter

        public boolean isAlphabetLetter(char c)

      • isNumber

        public static boolean isNumber(String tokenText)
        Applies number rules to the given token.
        Returns:
        True if the token is a number, false otherwise.
